actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes one Bite attack and two Claw attacks.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 14 (2d10 + 3 damage) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Scintillating Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales a burst of brilliant radiance in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 15 Constitution saving throw, taking 27 (6d8 damage) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The dragon then gains 10 temporary hit points by absorbing a portion of the radiant energy.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
